entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 02 January 2023
